Package javax.servlet.http.annotation

The javax.servlet.http.annotation package contains a number of annotations that allow users to use annotations to declare servlets, filters, listeners and specify the metadata for the declared component.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
FilterMapping This annotation is used define the filter mapping rules for the Filter annotated.
InitParam Used to declare init params in servlets in filters
Servlet Annotation used to declare a servlet that the container then processes at deployment time and makes available as per the url mapping rules.
ServletContextListener This annotation is used to declare a ServletContextListener
ServletFilter Annotation used to declare a Filter that the container then processes at deployment time and makes available as per the url mapping rules, the servlets it applies to and the dispatcher types that it applies to.
 

Package javax.servlet.http.annotation Description

The javax.servlet.http.annotation package contains a number of annotations that allow users to use annotations to declare servlets, filters, listeners and specify the metadata for the declared component.
